text.autoconfig.attributes.title: Attributes Config
text.autoconfig.attributes.option.mainTo: Toggles overlay showing cheapest upgrades by from bz, choose insta-buy/buy-order below.
text.autoconfig.attributes.option.number: Number of shards to display on the overlay
text.autoconfig.attributes.option.useBuy: Uses buy order prices instead of insta buy prices
text.autoconfig.attributes.option.overla: Change the text colour of the overlay, ARGB format
text.autoconfig.attributes.option.showCo: Displays the number of shards required to max and cost
text.autoconfig.attributes.option.sortBy: Changes display order to show cheapest shard to max rather than cheapest xp
text.autoconfig.attributes.option.showTo: Display the total cost to max attribute menu (probably way too much)
